# aci_access_monitoring_policy #

Data source for ACI Access Monitoring Policy

## API Information ##

* Class: [monInfraPol](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/monInfraPol/overview)

* Supported in ACI versions: 1.0(1e) and later.

* Distinguished Name Format: `uni/infra/moninfra-{name}`

## GUI Information ##

* Location: `Fabric -> Access Policies -> Policies -> Monitoring`

## Example Usage ##

```hcl

data "aci_access_monitoring_policy" "example" {
  name = "test_name"
}

```

## Schema ##

### Required ###

* `name` (name) - (string) The name of the Access Monitoring Policy object.

### Read-Only ###

* `id` - (string) The distinguished name (DN) of the Access Monitoring Policy object.
* `annotation` (annotation) - (string) The annotation of the Access Monitoring Policy object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
* `description` (descr) - (string) The description of the Access Monitoring Policy object.
* `name_alias` (nameAlias) - (string) The name alias of the Access Monitoring Policy object. This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 2.2(1k) and later.
* `owner_key` (ownerKey) - (string) The key for enabling clients to own their data for entity correlation.
* `owner_tag` (ownerTag) - (string) A tag for enabling clients to add their own data. For example, to indicate who created this object.
* `annotations` - (list) A list of Annotations (ACI object [tagAnnotation](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/tagAnnotation/overview)). This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
    * `key` (key) - (string) The key used to uniquely identify this configuration object.
    * `value` (value) - (string) The value of the property.
* `tags` - (list) A list of Tags (ACI object [tagTag](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/model-doc-latest/docs/app/index.html#/objects/tagTag/overview)). This attribute is supported in ACI versions: 3.2(1l) and later.
    * `key` (key) - (string) The key used to uniquely identify this configuration object.
    * `value` (value) - (string) The value of the property.
